data: {"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3334410,"name":"","username":"griffingreat1","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/g/71e660/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-03-16T13:45:33.666Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eSo this is the first year my team, 2815 is using pathplanner. We have had great success using it for autonomous and I have a question about using pathplanner autopilot for teleop. Currently I am getting the robot pose and the desired position (the speaker) and constructing a bezier path from these points when the driver presses the A button. However, before I test I have a question about it. If we are autopiloting back and there is a robot or obstacle in the way, Is it possible for the driver to override or cancel this command if they move the driver controller stick? (We are using purely dead reckoning as we do not have vision, so there is no way to detect other robots to avoid them automatically)\u003c/p\u003e","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":2,"updated_at":"2024-03-16T13:45:33.666Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":22,"reads":38,"readers_count":37,"score":117.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":458861,"topic_slug":"pathplanner-in-teleop-question","display_username":"","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":59845,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"2815 lead programmer"},"post_url":"/t/pathplanner-in-teleop-question/458861/1","custom_user_title":"2815 lead programmer","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3558253,"name":"system","username":"system","avatar_template":"/uploads/default/original/4X/9/3/2/93234578e69f55873c63fc00fe2d0d85f23bce55.png","created_at":"2025-03-16T13:45:58.209Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eThis topic was automatically closed 365 days after the last reply.
